title: Roast grey partridge with Savoy cabbage and pancetta
description: This wintery dish is packed with flavour, not least from the gamey (but not too gamey) flavour of the grey partridge. It’s a small bird, so you need one per person.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz vacuum-packed, peeled and cooked chestnuts, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
